issues: Objective could be better structured as a summary.
suggestions: Use consistent bullet points or formatting throughout the CV.
Rewrite the objective as a professional summary highlighting key skills and aspirations related to AI engineering.

strengths: Lists relevant coursework in AI and related fields.
Includes a range of technical skills relevant to AI, including programming languages, data science tools, and database systems.
Lists certifications relevant to the field.
weaknesses: Lacks practical experience and project details.
Skills are listed without demonstrating proficiency or providing context.
Extracurricular activities are listed but don't highlight leadership or AI-related contributions.
Objective is generic and doesn't specify target role within AI.
suggestions: Include any personal projects, hackathons, or research experience that showcase AI skills.
Quantify skills by mentioning tools or technologies used in projects.
Describe the roles in extracurriculars, and highlight any AI-related projects or initiatives.
Tailor the objective/summary to the specific AI engineer role, emphasizing desired skills and career aspirations.
Add a 'Projects' section detailing personal or academic projects where you applied your AI skills.

general.summary: The CV presents a good foundation in ICT and a budding interest in AI/ML. However, it lacks concrete examples of practical application and needs to be tailored to showcase skills relevant to an AI Engineer role by highlighting projects and quantifiable achievements.
top_priorities: Add a Projects section showcasing AI-related projects.
Quantify skills and provide context for technical abilities.
Tailor the objective/summary to align with the target AI Engineer role.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet:
Freshman ICT engineering student at the Higher School Of Communication Of Tunis with a deep interest in Artificial Intelligence
and Machine Learning.
inline_suggestions.problem: The objective is too general and doesn't highlight specific skills or career goals. It also uses the term 'Freshman' which isn't standard CV language.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Replace with a concise professional summary showcasing AI/ML skills and career aspirations.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Highly motivated ICT engineering student with a strong foundation in AI/ML principles, seeking an entry-level AI Engineer role to leverage skills in Python, Deep Learning, and NLP.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet:
Driven by curiosity and innovation, I’m actively delving into emerging AI technologies and modern machine
learning methodologies.
inline_suggestions.problem: This sentence is vague and doesn't provide any concrete information about your skills or experience.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Replace this with a quantifiable statement about a project you worked on.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Applied Deep Learning techniques to develop a novel image classification model with 90% accuracy using TensorFlow.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Relevant Coursework: Telecommunication Networks, Artificial Intelligence and Big Data.
inline_suggestions.problem: While relevant, this is a basic listing. It doesn't showcase depth of knowledge or specific projects.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Add specific projects or skills learned within each coursework.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Relevant Coursework: Telecommunication Networks (analyzed network protocols using Wireshark), Artificial Intelligence and Big Data (developed a sentiment analysis model using Python and NLTK).

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Programming Languages: Python, C, C++, MATLAB.
inline_suggestions.problem: The list is too general; there's no indication of proficiency.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Quantify the experience by stating levels of proficiency and specific frameworks used.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Programming Languages: Python (Proficient - Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch), C, C++, MATLAB.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet:
IEEE Sup’Com, Member
Sep. 2024 - Present
• Google DSC Sup’Com, Member
Sep. 2024 - Present
• Team Sup’Com, Member
inline_suggestions.problem: Listing memberships is weak without specifying what you did.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Describe your role and any achievements in these organizations, especially if AI-related.
inline_suggestions.replacement: IEEE Sup’Com, Member (Participated in robotics workshops, contributing to software development). Google DSC Sup’Com, Member (Attended AI/ML workshops and hackathons). Team Sup’Com, Member.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Languages: English (upper intermediate), French (intermediate), Arabic (Native Language), Romanian (beginner)
inline_suggestions.problem: This is good information but could be more impactful by explicitly stating conversational or written proficiency.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Languages: English (Fluent, written and spoken), French (Conversational), Arabic (Native Language), Romanian (beginner).

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Specialized Area: Network Telecommunications, ML, DL, Database Systems.
inline_suggestions.problem: This is vague and lacks depth. Needs to be more specific or incorporated elsewhere.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Remove this, and integrate the details into the Skills section or Project Descriptions.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet:
Other Tools & Technologies: Development Tools & Frameworks, AI & Machine Learning Frameworks, Database Management
& Data Warehousing, UML.
inline_suggestions.problem: Too broad and generic. Needs to be specific.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: List specific tools and technologies you have used in each category.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Other Tools & Technologies: IDEs (VS Code, PyCharm), AI Frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn), Database Management (MySQL, PostgreSQL), UML (StarUML).

inline_suggestions.problem: Lacks context. What did you learn, and how is it relevant?
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Add a brief description of the certification and key skills acquired.
inline_suggestions.replacement: NVIDIA Deep Learning Fundamentals (Certified in developing and deploying deep learning models using TensorFlow).

inline_suggestions.text_snippet:
Preparatory Institute for Engineering Studies of Monastir
Sep 2022 - Jun. 2024
Pre-Engineering Studies
Monastir, Tunisia
Ranked: 24/787
inline_suggestions.problem: The ranking is good but lacks context of what pre-engineering studies covers.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Include a brief summary of what the pre-engineering studies covers, particularly if related to math or science.
inline_suggestions.replacement:
Preparatory Institute for Engineering Studies of Monastir
Sep 2022 - Jun. 2024
Pre-Engineering Studies (focused on advanced mathematics and physics)
Monastir, Tunisia
Ranked: 24/787
